title: Malaysia: Citibank Bags Five Customer Service Awards
summary: Kuala Lumpur - Citibank won five top awards at the 14th Annual Customer Relationship Management and Contact Center Association of Malaysia's (CCAM) annual awards ceremony.
tag-1: Malaysia: Citibank Bags Five Customer Service Awards
tag-3: Kuala Lumpur – Citibank won five top awards at the 14th Annual Customer Relationship Management and Contact Center Association of Malaysia's (CCAM) annual awards ceremony.
tag-4: CitiPhone Banking's Goh Chi Xiang secured first place in the Best Contact Center Professional for Operations while Irene Tok obtained second place in the Best Contact Center Professional for Non-Operations under the Individual Category.
tag-5: CitiPhone Banking also chalked up two second-place awards in the Best Technology Innovation Contact Center and Best Process Excellence Contact Centre under the Corporate Open Category.
tag-6: For the talent contest, X-Factor Challenge Award category, Battalion C of the CitiPhone Group Performance danced its way to first place.
tag-7: CitiPhone is a 24x7 phone banking service handling nearly 3 million calls a year, 90 percent of which are calls handled within 20 seconds, exceeding the industry benchmark of 80 percent for handling customer calls within 20 seconds.
tag-8: These awards are a strong testament to CitiPhone Banking team's outstanding service standards in responding, 24x7, to customer requests and queries.
tag-9: Abhijit Kumta, Citibank Head of Operations & Technology, said today, "Citibank has consistently won call center awards in various categories over the years, a clear indicator that the investments we make in innovation and technology continue to take us to new levels of enhanced customer service. Our customers can conduct banking transactions anywhere at any time that is convenient to them. For us, the awards will motivate our teams even more to ensure excellent service delivery at all times."
tag-10: "Today, Citibank customers can call from anywhere in the world to check on their banking transactions, transfer funds, execute transactions and much more," he added.
tag-11: The 14th Annual CCAM awards was organized by the Contact Centre Association of Malaysia (CCAM).
tag-12: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
